A

AUTOMATIC_TRANSACTIONS - Static variable in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Boolean initialization parameter that enables or disables automatic starting of transactions with each request.

B

begin() - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Dao
A shortcut to Stripersist.getEntityManager().getTransaction().begin()

C

cleanup() - Method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Remove and close all the entity manager factories and clear the entity manager lookup map.
commit() - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Dao
A shortcut to Stripersist.getEntityManager().getTransaction().commit()
convert(String, Class<? extends Object>, Collection<ValidationError>) - Method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityTypeConverter
Converts value into the primary key's type for targetType and calls EntityManager.find(Class, Object).
createQuery(String) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Dao
A shortcut to Stripersist.getEntityManager().createQuery(query)

D

Dao - Class in org.stripesstuff.stripersist
Stripersist's Dao provides a simple generified static DAO.
deproxifyCglibClass(Class<? extends Object>) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityUtil
Return the proxified class for passed class.
DONT_CLOSE_ENTITYMANAGER - Static variable in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Boolean initialization parameter that enables or disables automatic closing of entity manager after each request.
DONT_ROLLBACK_TRANSACTION - Static variable in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Boolean initialization parameter that enables or disables rollback of active transactions after each request.

E

EntityFormatter - Class in org.stripesstuff.stripersist
EntityFormatter returns an entity's primary key as a string so Stripes can insert it into web pages.
EntityFormatter() - Constructor for class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityFormatter
 
EntityTypeConverter - Class in org.stripesstuff.stripersist
EntityTypeConverter retrieves an object of the specified target type by converting the value parameter into the primary key type for the class and calling EntityManager.find(Class, Object).
EntityTypeConverter() - Constructor for class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityTypeConverter
 
EntityUtil - Class in org.stripesstuff.stripersist
EntityUtil provides some convenience functions for working with entities.

F

finalize() - Method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Shutdown the EntityManagerFactories so they can release resources
find(Class<T>, K) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Dao
Generic version of JPA's find.
find(String, Object...) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Dao
Search the database for a unique entity that matches the given query.
findEntities(String) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Finds and returns all classes that are annotated with Entity or MappedSuperclass.
findIdField(Class<?>) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityUtil
Attempts to find a field annotated with Id.
findIdMethod(Class<?>) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityUtil
Attempts to find a method annotated with Id.
first(String, Object...) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Dao
Search the database for a list of entities matching the given query and return the first element of the list.
format(Object) - Method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityFormatter
Converts the entity's primary key to a String and returns it.

G

getEntityManager() - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
If Stripersist only knows about one EntityManager this is a convenient way to retrieve it.
getEntityManager(String) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Retrieves the EntityManager associated with the named persistence unit.
getEntityManager(Class<?>) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Retrieves an EntityManager that may be used with the specified type.
getEntityManagerFactory(String) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Finds the EntityManagerFactory which is associated with the specified persistence unit.
getEntityManagerFactory(Class<?>) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.Stripersist
Finds the EntityManagerFactory which is associated with the specified class.
getId(Object) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityUtil
Gets the value of the primary key for the specified entity.
getIdType(Class<? extends Object>) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityUtil
Checks the fields and methods of clazz to determine the primary key's type.
getIdTypeFromFields(Class<? extends Object>) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityUtil
Looks for an Id annotation on the fields of clazz to figure out the primary key's type.
getIdTypeFromMethods(Class<? extends Object>) - Static method in class org.stripesstuff.stripersist.EntityUtil
Looks for an Id annotation on the methods of clazz to figure out the primary key's type.

Unused

Called by Stripes during initialization.

Stripersist - Class in org.stripesstuff.stripersist
Stripersist provides a simple way to use JPA in Stripes applications.

StripersistInit - Interface in org.stripesstuff.stripersist
At startup Stripersist will search for classes implementing StripersistInit using the standard Stripes auto-discovery method.
